org.openstreetmap.osm.io
Class BoundingBoxDownloader

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.osm.io.BoundingBoxDownloader

public class BoundingBoxDownloader
extends java.lang.Object

The BoundingBoxDownloader can download all OpenStreetMap-Data within a given bounding-box.
by utilizing Osmosis. TODO: add support for downloading relations
TODO: add an optional Selector to filter the incomming data as soon as possible.

Author:
Marcus Wolschon

Parameters:
aMylat0 - the bounding-box to download.
aMylon0 - the bounding-box to download.
aMylat1 - the bounding-box to download.

BoundingBoxDownloader

public BoundingBoxDownloader(LatLon aCorner0,
                             LatLon aCorner1)
Prepare downloading and parsing the given bounding-box. (Start downloading with $parseOsm()}).

Parameters:
aCorner0 - one of the 2 corners spanning the bounding-box to download.
aCorner1 - one of the 2 corners spanning the bounding-box to download.
